:py:mod:`prime_hn2401.prime_hn2401`
===================================

.. py:module:: prime_hn2401.prime_hn2401


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   prime_hn2401.prime_hn2401.is_prime



.. py:function:: is_prime(n)

   Determines if a number is prime.

   Parameters:
   - n (int): The number to check for primality.

   Returns:
   - bool: True if n is prime, otherwise False.

   Example:
   >>> is_prime(7)
   True

   >>> is_prime(4)
   False
